key.description: last tabs configuration

key.name: window-01-tabs
key.description: last tabs configuration

key.name: dsp-fbs-vx
key.description: last VX setting (combo box index)

key.description: last VY setting (combo box index)

key.name: dsp-fbs-vz
key.description: last VZ setting (combo box index)

key.description: last VX offset setting (combo box index)

key.name: dsp-fbs-vz0

key.name: adv-enable-tip-return-to-center
key.description: Remembered state of tip-return-to-center checkbutton -- button binds

key.name: adv-enable-slope-compensation
key.description: Remembered state of slope compensation enabled checkbutton -- button binds

key.name: probe-sources
key.description: probe source channel encoding (bit coded)

key.name: probe-sources-x
key.description: probe X source channel encoding (bit coded)

key.name: probe-x-join
key.description: x join mode 0x3030 ??

key.name: probe-graph-enable-map-fill
key.description: Enable to fill in between raster points if raster probe grid more than 1.

key.name: probe-graph-enable-add-events
key.description: Disable to not add Probe Events to Master Scan.

key.name: probe-graph-enable-map-plot-events
key.summary: automatically plot profiles for mapping probe data
key.description: Automatically update plot profiles for mapping probe data at every raster point. Not recommended for fast repeating probes.

key.name: probe-graph-enable-map-save-events
key.summary: automatically save vpdata files for mapping probe data
key.description: Automatically save vpdata files for mapping probe data at every raster point. Not recommended for fast repeating probes.

key.name: probe-graph-matrix-window
key.description: use single window to organize all probe graphs

key.name: probe-p-sources
key.description: probe plot source channel encoding (bit coded)

key.name: probe-pavg-sources
key.description: probe source average channel encoding (bit coded)

key.name: probe-psec-sources
key.description: probe section source channel encoding (bit coded)

key.name: probe-tab-options
key.summary: dictionary for probe tabs (AC, ...) containing a varant holding a array of 8 uint64 values: @t [STS,.. option-flags, auto-flags, glock-data[6]]]
key.description: data

key.name: probe-lm-vector-program-matrix
key.summary: Current Program and Memos for Vector Program stores. (old/compatibility, obsolete) Dict of columns { du, dx, dy, dz, ts, pn, op, da, vn, vp } each vector has N_GVP_VECTORS x ( 1 + N*stores )
key.description: data

key.name: probe-gvp-vector-program-matrix
key.summary: Current Program and Memos for Vector Program stores. Dict of columns { du, dx, dy, dz, ts, pn, op, da, vn, vp } each vector has N_GVP_VECTORS x ( 1 + N*stores )
key.description: data
